text:
@realDonaldTrump Cut the crap!

Your approval rating is a bismol 35% which means 65% disapproves. 

You're entitled to your own opinion, but you're not entitled to your own facts. 

Thank you! 

#KimJongUn #COVID19 #PresidentialDisaster
